personal_info.name: YOUNESS KELLAL
personal_info.title: DATA & AI Specialist
personal_info.bio: Motivated Data Analytics and AI student with strong academic foundations and hands-on experience in software development and IT support. Skilled in machine learning, deep learning, computer vision, and data visualization, with practical full- stack experience gained through internships at AttijariWafa Bank and Centrale Danone. Proficient in Docker, REST APIs, Laravel, Spring Boot, and Oracle. Trilingual (French, English, Arabic) with strong analytical, problem-solving, and teamwork skills.

academic.degree: Master in Data Analytics &  ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
Bachelor's Degree in Data Analytics and Artificial Intelligence

academic.institution: Higher School of Technology – Béni Mellal

projects.title: Real-Time Recommendation System
projects.description: A high-performance recommendation system built for e-commerce platforms using Apache Kafka for real-time data streaming, Apache Flink for distributed stream processing, and collaborative filtering with matrix factorization. The system processes millions of user interactions per day and provides personalized recommendations with sub-100ms latency.

projects.title: YOLOv8 Person Detection with Age/Gender Estimation
projects.description: A comprehensive computer vision project combining YOLOv8 for real-time person detection with a custom CNN-based age and gender classifier. Achieves 95% accuracy on age prediction and 97% on gender classification. Includes deployment on edge devices and RTSP stream processing.

projects.title: Deep Learning for Cancer Detection
projects.description: Advanced medical imaging project using state-of-the-art deep learning models including U-Net for segmentation, attention mechanisms for feature refinement, and ensemble CNNs for classification. Achieved 94% sensitivity and 91% specificity on the validation dataset. Implemented with explainable AI techniques.

projects.title: Intelligent Reservoir Surveillance System
projects.description: IoT-based surveillance system for real-time monitoring of water reservoirs. Integrates sensor networks with Firebase for data storage, provides real-time dashboards for water level tracking, contamination detection, and predictive analytics. Supports multiple concurrent data streams with automated alerting.

projects.title: Port Scan Detection System
projects.description: Machine learning-based network security tool for detecting TCP port scanning attacks. Includes comprehensive dataset creation with 50,000+ labeled samples, multiple detection models (Random Forest, XGBoost, Neural Networks), and a real-time detection dashboard. Achieves 98% detection accuracy with minimal false positives.

projects.title: Multilingual Translation System
projects.description: Advanced translation system supporting 40+ languages using transformer models (Mariane, NLLB), integrated with OCR for image text extraction and text-to-speech for audio output. Features chat-based interface for interactive translation with context awareness.
